metaDescription: Discover COUNTRY CLUB in Mazarron. Modern 3-bed villas from €339,900. BLUE MED INVEST development. Ready May 2027. International community.

content.heroIntro: Welcome to COUNTRY CLUB, an exclusive residential development by BLUE MED INVEST located in the charming town of Mazarron, Murcia. This premier villa community offers exceptional value for discerning buyers seeking the Spanish lifestyle at 40% less than comparable properties on Spanish islands. Each villa features modern architecture with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and built sizes ranging from 95-100m², set on generous plots of 232-355m². With delivery scheduled for May 1st, 2027, COUNTRY CLUB represents an outstanding investment opportunity in one of Spain's most sought-after emerging markets. The development combines quality construction, competitive pricing, and strategic location within easy reach of pristine beaches, championship golf courses, and comprehensive amenities. Whether you're seeking a holiday retreat, permanent residence, or investment property with strong rental potential (€800/week), COUNTRY CLUB delivers exceptional lifestyle value in the heart of Costa Blanca.

locationSection.intro: Mazarron is a vibrant coastal town in Murcia that has established itself as a premier destination for international property buyers. The area combines authentic Spanish charm with modern conveniences, boasting an established international community where English is commonly spoken. Located strategically on the Costa Blanca, Mazarron offers the perfect balance of relaxation and accessibility. The region features world-class healthcare facilities, quality education options including international schools with British curriculum, and abundant leisure opportunities. The town's Mediterranean climate, combined with its proximity to multiple Blue Flag beaches and championship golf courses, makes it an ideal location for those seeking both lifestyle and investment returns. Property values in Mazarron have demonstrated consistent growth at +8% year-on-year, reflecting strong market confidence and rental demand.
highlights: Airport: 30 minutes to Alicante International Airport (ALC)
Beach: Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes
Golf: Several championship courses nearby including regional favorites
Hospital: Regional hospital within 30 minutes, private clinics with English-speaking doctors
Shopping: Mercadona, Lidl, Consum supermarkets and local markets
Restaurants: Diverse dining options from traditional Spanish cuisine to international restaurants

propertyFeatures.intro: COUNTRY CLUB villas are constructed to the highest standards by BLUE MED INVEST, a trusted developer with proven expertise in Costa Blanca properties. Each villa showcases contemporary design combined with quality materials and finishes throughout. The properties feature solid construction with energy-efficient specifications, including thermal break double glazing and pre-installed air conditioning systems. Modern open-plan living areas maximize natural light and create seamless flow between indoor and outdoor spaces. The attention to detail extends to premium bathroom fixtures, ceramic flooring, fitted kitchens with quality appliances, and sophisticated video entry security systems. Every villa includes private parking and storage facilities, with landscaped gardens providing privacy and outdoor enjoyment space.
features: Private/communal swimming pool with maintenance included
Double glazing with thermal break for energy efficiency

content.investmentSection: COUNTRY CLUB represents a compelling investment opportunity in one of Spain's most dynamic emerging markets. Mazarron's property market has demonstrated consistent growth at +8% year-on-year, significantly outperforming broader regional trends. Priced at €2,200/m², COUNTRY CLUB villas offer exceptional value—approximately 40% less than comparable properties on Spanish islands like Ibiza and Mallorca. The rental market is particularly strong, with similar properties commanding €800 per week during high season, providing substantial returns for investment-focused buyers. The established international community and English-speaking environment make this an attractive option for overseas investors seeking both capital appreciation and rental income. With completion scheduled for May 2027, early buyers benefit from favorable pricing and project financing options. The combination of lifestyle benefits, market fundamentals, and strong rental demand makes COUNTRY CLUB an intelligent choice for those seeking diversification into European real estate.

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in COUNTRY CLUB?
faqs.answer: COUNTRY CLUB villas start from €339,900. The development offers 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom villas with built sizes of 95-100m² on plots ranging from 232-355m². Currently, 2 units are available. Pricing reflects exceptional value at €2,200/m², approximately 40% less than comparable Spanish island properties. Contact us for current availability and flexible payment options.

faqs.question: When will COUNTRY CLUB be completed?
faqs.answer: COUNTRY CLUB is scheduled for delivery on May 1st, 2027. BLUE MED INVEST provides a 10-year structural warranty on all construction. Buyers typically receive updates quarterly during construction, with final inspections coordinated 30 days prior to completion. Contact us for specific delivery schedules and payment milestones.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of COUNTRY CLUB?
faqs.answer: BLUE MED INVEST is the developer of COUNTRY CLUB. They have an established track record building quality homes throughout Mazarron and the Murcia region. BLUE MED INVEST is known for completing projects on schedule, maintaining high construction standards, and providing excellent after-sales service. All properties include their comprehensive 10-year structural warranty.

faqs.question: Is Mazarron a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Mazarron offers exceptional value and lifestyle benefits for property buyers. The area has an established international community where English is commonly spoken. Property values show consistent growth at +8% year-on-year with strong rental demand. Key amenities include a regional hospital within 30 minutes, multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes, several championship golf courses, and quality international schools. The town perfectly balances authentic Spanish character with modern conveniences.

faqs.question: How far is COUNTRY CLUB from the beach?
faqs.answer: COUNTRY CLUB is within 20 minutes of multiple Blue Flag beaches. The location provides easy beach access while maintaining peaceful residential surroundings. Mazarron's coastline features several pristine beaches ideal for swimming, water sports, and relaxation. The proximity to beaches makes COUNTRY CLUB perfect for both permanent residents and holiday home owners.

faqs.question: What amenities are near COUNTRY CLUB?
faqs.answer: COUNTRY CLUB benefits from excellent nearby amenities including Mercadona, Lidl, and Consum supermarkets for daily shopping; a regional hospital within 30 minutes with private clinics offering English-speaking doctors; several championship golf courses within easy reach; multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes; and diverse restaurants offering both traditional Spanish and international cuisine. International schools with British curriculum options are also available in the region.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can freely purchase property in Spain. EU citizens face no restrictions. Non-EU citizens require an NIE (Tax Identification Number) and may face minor additional requirements depending on their country of origin. Most nationalities, including UK, US, Canadian, and Australian citizens, have no restrictions. We can guide you through the NIE application process and all legal documentation required for your purchase.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Additional costs typically include transfer tax (6-10% depending on region), notary fees (approximately 1-2%), land registry fees (0.1-0.5%), and legal fees (1-3%). For COUNTRY CLUB in Murcia, transfer tax is approximately 8%. Total additional costs usually range from 8-15% of the purchase price. We provide detailed cost breakdowns for each property to ensure complete transparency.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential for COUNTRY CLUB?
faqs.answer: COUNTRY CLUB villas offer strong rental potential at approximately €800 per week. The Mazarron area attracts consistent tourism and expat visitor demand. Properties typically achieve 50-70% annual occupancy rates depending on management and season. Many owners generate €35,000-€45,000 annually from short-term rentals, providing excellent returns on investment while maintaining personal use flexibility.

content.conclusion: COUNTRY CLUB represents a unique opportunity to acquire a modern villa in an increasingly desirable Spanish location at exceptional value. BLUE MED INVEST has created a development that perfectly balances lifestyle benefits with investment potential. Whether you're seeking a permanent residence, holiday retreat, or rental investment, COUNTRY CLUB delivers on all fronts. The combination of strategic location, quality construction, competitive pricing, and strong market fundamentals makes this an intelligent choice for international property buyers. With only 2 units currently available and delivery scheduled for May 2027, early commitment offers favorable pricing and flexible payment options. The established international community, excellent amenities, and proven +8% year-on-year market growth provide confidence in both lifestyle satisfaction and long-term value appreciation. Contact us today via WhatsApp to arrange a viewing, receive detailed property specifications, pricing options, and investment projections. Our team is ready to guide you through every step of the purchase process.
